text: Kylie Jenner ’ s new TV show has been slammed by critics and fans as “ fake ” and “ boring ” – and now the Kardashians are desperately trying to rescue the show. The Life Of Kylie only managed to draw in half the viewers that brother Rob Kardashian ’ s reality series Rob & Chyna managed to on it's debut – and The Sun Online can exclusively reveal that the second episode is being re - cut to make it more exciting. E! Networks 2 In Kylie's show, she agonises over taking the perfect selfie “ The show was a disaster – no - one liked it, ” says an LA TV source. “ The whole family is panicking and the rest of the series is now being recut to make it more exciting. ” “ The ending of the second episode
